title: A Curriculum based on child development
brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Elementary School Teacher Education”.
Projects undertaken by typical fourth-grade students are used in explaining the methods employed by an elementary school teacher to adapt the curriculum to the needs of her pupils. Points out that the developmental characteristics of pre-adolescents must be considered in all phases of the curriculum.
